name: Eventer
author: Jyothis Joy

sections.installation:
1. Upload eventer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Commit – May the force be with this plugin.
sections.description:
• Eventer – List of registrations, You can edit each of them except the images.
  • Settings – Not a page where you can change the settings, but you can find the shortcodes and other information.

Shortcodes

  • [eventer_submit_form] – For registrations form.
  • [eventer_user_display] – For displaying the list of users in the frontend.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload eventer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
